entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then clearing. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 70 gusting to 90 early this evening then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 9 April 2023
